name: KNMExternalViewController
summary: A view controller that loads its contents from another storyboard.
description:
Use this view controller when you would like to split your project into multiple storyboards.
Put the view controller into your main storyboard and specify the name of the storyboard and
scene you would like to jump to when loading the view controller. KNMExternalViewController
then automatically loads the contents when shown on the screen.
